info.title: Kavita
info.description: Kavita provides a set of APIs that are authenticated by JWT. JWT token can be copied from local storage.

post.summary: Update a user's password
Register the first user (admin) on the server. Will not do anything if an admin is already confirmed
Perform a login. Will send JWT Token of the logged in user back.
Refreshes the user's JWT token

get.summary: Get All Roles back. See API.Constants.PolicyConstants

post.summary: Resets the API Key assigned with a user

Initiates the flow to update a user's email address. The email address is not changed in this API. A confirmation link is sent/dumped which will
validate the email. It must be confirmed for the email to update.
Update the user account. This can only affect Username, Email (will require confirming), Roles, and Library access.

get.summary: Requests the Invite Url for the UserId. Will return error if user is already validated.

parameters.name: withBaseUrl
parameters.description: Include the "https://ip:port/" in the generated link

post.summary:
Invites a user to the server. Will generate a setup link for continuing setup. If the server is not accessible, no
email will be sent.
Last step in authentication flow, confirms the email token for email
Final step in email update change. Given a confirmation token and the email, this will finish the email change.
post.description: This will force connected clients to re-authenticate

post.summary: Will send user a link to update their password to their email or prompt them if not accessible
This is similar to invite. Essentially we authenticate the user's password then go through invite email flow

get.summary: Checks if an admin exists on the system. This is essentially a check to validate if the system has been setup.
Retrieves information for the PDF and Epub reader
get.description: This only applies to Epub or PDF files

get.summary: This is an entry point to fetch resources from within an epub chapter/book.

This will return a list of mappings from ID -> page num. ID will be the xhtml key and page num will be the reading order
this is used to rewrite anchors in the book text so that we always load properly in our reader.
get.description: This is essentially building the table of contents

get.summary:
This returns a single page within the epub book. All html will be rewritten to be scoped within our reader,
all css is scoped, etc.
Return a list of all collection tags on the server

Searches against the collection tags on the DB and returns matches that meet the search criteria.
<remarks>Search strings will be cleaned of certain fields, like %</remarks>

parameters.name: queryString
parameters.description: Search term

get.summary: Checks if a collection exists with the name

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: If empty or null, will return true as that is invalid

post.summary:
Updates an existing tag with a new title, promotion status, and summary.
<remarks>UI does not contain controls to update title</remarks>
Adds a collection tag onto multiple Series. If tag id is 0, this will create a new tag.
For a given tag, update the summary if summary has changed and remove a set of series from the tag.

delete.summary: Deletes the device from the user

get.summary: For a given volume, return the size in bytes
For a given chapter, return the size in bytes
For a series, return the size in bytes
Downloads all chapters within a volume. If the chapters are multiple zips, they will all be zipped up.
Returns the zip for a single chapter. If the chapter contains multiple files, they will be zipped.

post.summary: Downloads all bookmarks in a zip for

get.summary: Returns cover image for Chapter
Returns cover image for Library
Returns cover image for Volume
Returns cover image for Series

parameters.name: seriesId
parameters.description: Id of Series

get.summary: Returns cover image for Collection Tag
Returns cover image for a Reading List
Returns image for a given bookmark page
get.description: This request is served unauthenticated, but user must be passed via api key to validate

parameters.name: pageNum
parameters.description: Starts at 0

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key for user. Needed to authenticate request

get.summary: Returns a temp coverupload image

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Filename of file. This is used with upload/upload-by-url

post.summary: Creates a new Library. Upon library creation, adds new library to all Admin accounts.

get.summary: Returns a list of directories for a given path. If path is empty, returns root drives.

post.summary: Given a valid path, will invoke either a Scan Series or Scan Library. If the folder does not exist within Kavita, the request will be ignored

get.summary: Checks if the library name exists or not

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: If empty or null, will return true as that is invalid

post.summary: Updates an existing Library with new name, folders, and/or type.
post.description: Any folder or type change will invoke a scan.

get.summary: Fetches genres from the instance

parameters.name: libraryIds
parameters.description: String separated libraryIds or null for all genres

get.summary: Fetches people from the instance

parameters.name: libraryIds
parameters.description: String separated libraryIds or null for all people

get.summary: Fetches all tags from the instance

parameters.name: libraryIds
parameters.description: String separated libraryIds or null for all tags

get.summary: Fetches all age ratings from the instance
get.description: This API is cached for 1 hour, varying by libraryIds

parameters.name: libraryIds
parameters.description: String separated libraryIds or null for all ratings

get.summary: Fetches all publication status' from the instance
get.description: This API is cached for 1 hour, varying by libraryIds

parameters.name: libraryIds
parameters.description: String separated libraryIds or null for all publication status

get.summary: Fetches all age languages from the libraries passed (or if none passed, all in the server)
get.description: This does not perform RBS for the user if they have Library access due to the non-sensitive nature of languages

parameters.name: libraryIds
parameters.description: String separated libraryIds or null for all ratings

get.summary: Returns summary for the chapter
Downloads a file

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: User's API Key

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Not used. Only for Chunky to allow download links

post.summary: Authenticate with the Server given an apiKey. This will log you in by returning the user object and the JWT token.
post.description: This API is not fully built out and may require more information in later releases

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API key which will be used to authenticate and return a valid user token back

parameters.name: pluginName
parameters.description: Name of the Plugin

get.summary: Returns the PDF for the chapterId.
Returns an image for a given chapter. Will perform bounding checks
get.description: This will cache the chapter images for reading

parameters.name: chapterId
parameters.description: Chapter Id

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page in question

parameters.name: extractPdf
parameters.description: Should Kavita extract pdf into images. Defaults to false.

get.summary: Returns an image for a given bookmark series. Side effect: This will cache the bookmark images for reading.
get.description: We must use api key as bookmarks could be leaked to other users via the API

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Api key for the user the bookmarks are on

get.summary: Returns the file dimensions for all pages in a chapter. If the underlying chapter is PDF, use extractPDF to unpack as images.
get.description:
This has a side effect of caching the images.
            This will only be populated on archive filetypes and not in bookmark mode

get.summary: Returns various information about a Chapter. Side effect: This will cache the chapter images for reading.

parameters.name: extractPdf
parameters.description: Should Kavita extract pdf into images. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: includeDimensions
parameters.description: Include file dimensions. Only useful for image based reading

get.summary: Returns various information about all bookmark files for a Series. Side effect: This will cache the bookmark images for reading.

parameters.name: seriesId
parameters.description: Series Id for all bookmarks

post.summary: Marks a Series as read. All volumes and chapters will be marked as read during this process.
Marks a Series as Unread. All volumes and chapters will be marked as unread during this process.
Marks all chapters within a volume as unread
Marks all chapters within a volume as Read
Marks all chapters within a list of volumes as Read. All volumes must belong to the same Series.
Marks all chapters within a list of volumes as Unread. All volumes must belong to the same Series.
Marks all chapters within a list of series as Read.
Marks all chapters within a list of series as Unread.

get.summary: Returns Progress (page number) for a chapter for the logged in user

post.summary: Save page against Chapter for logged in user

get.summary:
Continue point is the chapter which you should start reading again from. If there is no progress on a series, then the first chapter will be returned (non-special unless only specials).
Otherwise, loop through the chapters and volumes in order to find the next chapter which has progress.
Returns if the user has reading progress on the Series

post.summary: Marks every chapter that is sorted below the passed number as Read. This will not mark any specials as read.
post.description: This is built for Tachiyomi and is not expected to be called by any other place

get.summary: Returns a list of bookmarked pages for a given Chapter

post.summary: Returns a list of all bookmarked pages for a User
Removes all bookmarks for all chapters linked to a Series
Removes all bookmarks for all chapters linked to a Series

get.summary: Returns all bookmarked pages for a given volume
Returns all bookmarked pages for a given series

post.summary: Bookmarks a page against a Chapter
post.description: This has a side effect of caching the chapter files to disk

post.summary: Removes a bookmarked page for a Chapter

get.summary: Returns the next logical chapter from the series.
Returns the previous logical chapter from the series.
For the current user, returns an estimate on how long it would take to finish reading the series.
get.description: For Epubs, this does not check words inside a chapter due to overhead so may not work in all cases.

get.summary: Fetches a single Reading List

post.summary: Returns reading lists (paginated) for a given user.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

parameters.name: includePromoted
parameters.description: Include Promoted Reading Lists along with user's Reading Lists. Defaults to true

get.summary: Returns all Reading Lists the user has access to that have a series within it.
Fetches all reading list items for a given list including rich metadata around series, volume, chapters, and progress

post.summary: Updates an items position
Deletes a list item from the list. Will reorder all item positions afterwards
Removes all entries that are fully read from the reading list
Creates a new List with a unique title. Returns the new ReadingList back
Update the properties (title, summary) of a reading list
Adds all chapters from a Series to a reading list
Adds all chapters from a list of volumes and chapters to a reading list
Adds all chapters from a list of series to a reading list

get.summary: Returns the next chapter within the reading list
Returns the prev chapter within the reading list
Checks if a reading list exists with the name

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: If empty or null, will return true as that is invalid

get.summary: Quick Reads are series that should be readable in less than 10 in total and are not Ongoing in release.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Library to restrict series to

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

get.summary: Quick Catchup Reads are series that should be readable in less than 10 in total and are Ongoing in release.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Library to restrict series to

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

get.summary: Highly Rated based on other users ratings. Will pull series with ratings > 4.0, weighted by count of other users.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Library to restrict series to

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

get.summary: Chooses a random genre and shows series that are in that without reading progress

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Library to restrict series to

parameters.name: genreId
parameters.description: Genre Id

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

get.summary: Series that are fully read by the user in no particular order

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Library to restrict series to

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

get.summary:
Returns the series for the MangaFile id. If the user does not have access (shouldn't happen by the UI),
then null is returned

Returns the series for the Chapter id. If the user does not have access (shouldn't happen by the UI),
then null is returned

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

get.summary: Fetches a Series for a given Id

parameters.name: seriesId
parameters.description: Series Id to fetch details for

get.summary: Returns All volumes for a series with progress information and Chapters

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

post.summary: Fetches series that are on deck aka have progress on them.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Default of 0 meaning all libraries

post.summary: Runs a Cover Image Generation task
Scan a series and force each file to be updated. This should be invoked via the User, hence why we force.
Run a file analysis on the series.

get.summary: Returns metadata for a given series

post.summary: Update series metadata

get.summary: Returns all Series grouped by the passed Collection Id with Pagination.

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: Collection Id to pull series from

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

post.summary:
Fetches Series for a set of Ids. This will check User for permission access and filter out any Ids that don't exist or
the user does not have access to.

get.summary: Get the age rating for the API.Entities.Enums.AgeRating enum value
get.description: This is cached for an hour

get.summary: Get a special DTO for Series Detail page.
get.description: Do not rely on this API externally. May change without hesitation.

get.summary: Fetches the related series for a given series

parameters.name: relation
parameters.description: Type of Relationship to pull back

get.summary: Returns all related series against the passed series Id

post.summary: Update the relations attached to the Series. Does not generate associated Sequel/Prequel pairs on target series.
Attempts to Restart the server. Does not work, will shutdown the instance.
Performs an ad-hoc cleanup of Cache
Performs an ad-hoc cleanup of Want To Read, by removing want to read series for users, where the series are fully read and in Completed publication status.
Performs an ad-hoc backup of the Database
This is a one time task that needs to be ran for v0.7 statistics to work

get.summary: Returns non-sensitive information about the current system

post.summary: Triggers the scheduling of the convert bookmarks job. Only one job will run at a time.
Triggers the scheduling of the convert covers job. Only one job will run at a time.

get.summary: Checks for updates, if no updates that are > current version installed, returns null
Is this server accessible to the outside net

post.summary: Resets the email service url

get.summary: Returns users with the top reads in the server
A breakdown of different files, their size, and format
Returns reading history events for a give or all users, broken up by day, and format

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If 0, defaults to all users, else just userId

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: If 0, defaults to all time, else just those days asked for

get.summary: Returns a count of pages read per year for a given userId.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If userId is 0 and user is not an admin, API will default to userId

get.summary: Returns a count of words read per year for a given userId.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If userId is 0 and user is not an admin, API will default to userId

get.summary: Given the series Id, this should return the latest chapter that has been fully read.

post.summary: Marks every chapter that is sorted below the passed number as Read. This will not mark any specials as read.
post.description: This is built for Tachiyomi and is not expected to be called by any other place

get.summary: Returns css content to the UI. UI is expected to escape the content

post.summary:
This stores a file (image) in temp directory for use in a cover image replacement flow.
This is automatically cleaned up.
Replaces series cover image and locks it with a base64 encoded image
Replaces collection tag cover image and locks it with a base64 encoded image
Replaces reading list cover image and locks it with a base64 encoded image
Replaces chapter cover image and locks it with a base64 encoded image. This will update the parent volume's cover image.
Replaces library cover image with a base64 encoded image. If empty string passed, will reset to null.
Replaces chapter cover image and locks it with a base64 encoded image. This will update the parent volume's cover image.

get.summary: Returns the preferences of the user
Returns a list of the user names within the system

post.summary: Return all Series that are in the current logged in user's Want to Read list, filtered

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

post.summary: Given a list of Series Ids, add them to the current logged in user's Want To Read list
Given a list of Series Ids, remove them from the current logged in user's Want To Read list

includeUnknowns.description: Are Unknowns explicitly allowed against age rating

readingLists.description: Reading lists associated with this user

wantToRead.description: A list of Series the user want's to read

devices.description: A list of Devices which allows the user to send files to

apiKey.description: An API Key to interact with external services, like OPDS

confirmationToken.description: The confirmation token for the user (invite). This will be set to null after the user confirms.

ageRestrictionIncludeUnknowns.description: If an age rating restriction is applied to the account, if Unknowns should be allowed for the user. Defaults to false.

AppUserBookmark.description: Represents a saved page in a Chapter entity for a given user.

autoCloseMenu.description: Manga Reader Option: Allow the menu to close after 6 seconds without interaction

showScreenHints.description: Manga Reader Option: Show screen hints to the user on some actions, ie) pagination direction change

emulateBook.description: Manga Reader Option: Emulate a book by applying a shadow effect on the pages

backgroundColor.description: Manga Reader Option: Background color of the reader

bookReaderMargin.description: Book Reader Option: Override extra Margin

bookReaderFontSize.description: Book Reader Option: Override font size

bookReaderFontFamily.description: Book Reader Option: Maps to the default Kavita font-family (inherit) or an override

bookReaderTapToPaginate.description: Book Reader Option: Allows tapping on side of screens to paginate

bookThemeName.description: Book Reader Option: The color theme to decorate the book contents

bookReaderImmersiveMode.description: Book Reader Option: A flag that hides the menu-ing system behind a click on the screen. This should be used with tap to paginate, but the app doesn't enforce this.

blurUnreadSummaries.description: UI Site Global Setting: If unread summaries should be blurred until expanded or unless user has read it already

promptForDownloadSize.description: UI Site Global Setting: Should Kavita prompt user to confirm downloads that are greater than 100 MB.

noTransitions.description: UI Site Global Setting: Should Kavita disable CSS transitions

bookScrollId.description:
For Book Reader, represents the nearest passed anchor on the screen that can be used to resume scroll point
on next load

AppUserProgress.description: Represents the progress a single user has on a given Chapter.

rating.description: A number between 0-5 that represents how good a series is.

review.description: A short summary the user can write when giving their review.

part.description: A part represents the id of the anchor so we can scroll to it. 01_values.xhtml#h_sVZPaxUSy/

page.description: Page Number to load for the chapter

number.description: Smallest number of the Range. Can be a partial like Chapter 4.5

files.description: The files that represent this Chapter

coverImage.description: Relative path to the (managed) image file representing the cover image

pages.description: Total number of pages in all MangaFiles

isSpecial.description: If this Chapter contains files that could only be identified as Series or has Special Identifier from filename

title.description: Used for books/specials to display custom title. For non-specials/books, will be set to API.Entities.Chapter.Range

totalCount.description: Total number of issues or volumes in the series

count.description: Number of the Total Count (progress the Series is complete)

wordCount.description: Total Word count of all chapters in this chapter.

people.description: All people attached at a Chapter level. Usually Comics will have different people per issue.

pages.description: Total number of pages in all MangaFiles

isSpecial.description: If this Chapter contains files that could only be identified as Series or has Special Identifier from filename

title.description: Used for books/specials to display custom title. For non-specials/books, will be set to API.DTOs.ChapterDto.Range

files.description: The files that represent this Chapter

pagesRead.description: Calculated at API time. Number of pages read for this Chapter for logged in user.

coverImageLocked.description: If the Cover Image is locked for this entity

volumeId.description: Volume Id this Chapter belongs to

wordCount.description: Total words in a Chapter (books only)

ChapterDto.description:
A Chapter is the lowest grouping of a reading medium. A Chapter contains a set of MangaFiles which represents the underlying
file (abstracted from type).

chapterTitle.description: Chapter's title if set via ComicInfo.xml (Title field)

pages.description: Total Number of pages in this Chapter

isSpecial.description: If this is marked as a special in Kavita

subtitle.description: The subtitle to render on the reader

pageDimensions.description: List of all files with their inner archive structure maintained in filename and dimensions

doublePairs.description: For Double Page reader, this will contain snap points to ensure the reader always resumes on correct page

ChapterInfoDto.description: Information about the Chapter for the Reader to render

coverImage.description: Absolute path to the (managed) image file

coverImageLocked.description: Denotes if the CoverImage has been overridden by the user. If so, it will not be updated during normal scan operations.

normalizedTitle.description: A normalized string used to check if the tag already exists in the DB

promoted.description: A promoted collection tag will allow all linked seriesMetadata's Series to show for all users.

rowVersion.description: Not Used due to not using concurrency update

CollectionTag.description: Represents a user entered field that is used as a tagging and grouping mechanism

seriesIds.description: Series Ids to add onto Collection Tag

coverImage.description: The cover image string. This is used on Frontend to show or hide the Cover Image

ipAddress.description: Last Seen IP Address of the device

name.description: A name given to this device

emailAddress.description: An email address associated with the device (ie Kindle). Will be used with Send to functionality

lastUsed.description: Last time this device was used to send a file

Device.description: A Device is an entity that can receive data from Kavita (kindle)

name.description: A name given to this device

emailAddress.description: An email address associated with the device (ie Kindle). Will be used with Send to functionality

lastUsed.description: Last time this device was used to send a file

DeviceDto.description: A Device is an entity that can receive data from Kavita (kindle)

EmailTestResultDto.description: Represents if Test Email Service URL was successful or not and if any error occured

fileName.description: The filename of the cached file. If this was nested in a subfolder, the foldername will be appended with _

extension.description: The extension with the ., in lowercase

formats.description: The type of Formats you want to be returned. An empty list will return all formats back

libraries.description: A list of library ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all libraries by passing empty list

genres.description: A list of Genre ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all genres by passing an empty list

writers.description: A list of Writers to restrict search to. Defaults to all Writers by passing an empty list

penciller.description: A list of Penciller ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Pencillers by passing an empty list

inker.description: A list of Inker ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Inkers by passing an empty list

colorist.description: A list of Colorist ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Colorists by passing an empty list

letterer.description: A list of Letterer ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Letterers by passing an empty list

coverArtist.description: A list of CoverArtist ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all CoverArtists by passing an empty list

editor.description: A list of Editor ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Editors by passing an empty list

publisher.description: A list of Publisher ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Publishers by passing an empty list

character.description: A list of Character ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Characters by passing an empty list

translators.description: A list of Translator ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Translatorss by passing an empty list

collectionTags.description: A list of Collection Tag ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Collection Tags by passing an empty list

tags.description: A list of Tag ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Tags by passing an empty list

rating.description:
Will return back everything with the rating and above
API.Entities.AppUserRating.Rating

ageRating.description: Age Ratings. Empty list will return everything back

languages.description: Languages (ISO 639-1 code) to filter by. Empty list will return everything back

publicationStatus.description: Publication statuses to filter by. Empty list will return everything back

seriesNameQuery.description: An optional name string to filter by. Empty string will ignore.

lastScanned.description: Used when scanning to see if we can skip if nothing has changed

minHours.description: Min hours to read the selection

maxHours.description: Max hours to read the selection

avgHours.description: Estimated average hours to read the selection

HourEstimateRangeDto.description: A range of time to read a selection (series, chapter, etc)

Int32Range.description: Represents a range between two int/float/double

roles.description:
List of Roles to assign to user. If admin not present, Pleb will be applied.
If admin present, all libraries will be granted access and will ignore those from DTO.

libraries.description: A list of libraries to grant access to

title.description: Human Readable title for the Job

lastExecution.description: Last time the job was run

size.description: Number of items in this Key

key.description: Code to use in URL (url encoded)

JumpKeyDto.description: Represents an individual button in a Jump Bar

folderWatching.description: If Folder Watching is enabled for this library

includeInDashboard.description: Include Library series on Dashboard Streams

includeInRecommended.description: Include Library series on Recommended Streams

coverImage.description: An optional Cover Image or null

folderWatching.description: If Folder Watching is enabled for this library

includeInDashboard.description: Include Library series on Dashboard Streams

includeInRecommended.description: Include Library series on Recommended Streams

filePath.description: Absolute path to the archive file

pages.description: Number of pages for the given file

bytes.description: How many bytes make up this file

lastModified.description: Last time underlying file was modified

lastFileAnalysis.description: Last time file analysis ran on this file

MangaFile.description: Represents a wrapper to the underlying file. This provides information around file, like number of pages, format, etc.

MangaFormat.description: Represents the format of the file

volumeIds.description: A list of Volumes to mark read

chapterIds.description: A list of additional Chapters to mark as read

MarkVolumesReadDto.description: This is used for bulk updating a set of volume and or chapters in one go

MemberDto.description: Represents a member of a Kavita server.

bookScrollId.description:
For Book reader, this can be an optional string of the id of a part marker, to help resume reading position
on pages that combine multiple "chapters".

lastModified.description: Last time the progress was synced from UI or external app

ReadHistoryEvent.description: Represents a single User's reading event

ReadStatus.description: Represents the Reading Status. This is a flag and allows multiple statues

normalizedTitle.description: A normalized string used to check if the reading list already exists in the DB

promoted.description: Reading lists that are promoted are only done by admins

coverImage.description: Absolute path to the (managed) image file

ReadingList.description: This is a collection of API.Entities.ReadingListItem which represent individual chapters and an order.

promoted.description: Reading lists that are promoted are only done by admins

coverImage.description: This is used to tell the UI if it should request a Cover Image or not. If null or empty, it has not been set.

order.description: Order of the chapter within a Reading List

title.description: This will automatically map to Volume X, Chapter Y, etc.

chapterId.description: Chapter Id if this is a chapter. Not guaranteed to be set.

volumeId.description: Volume Id if this is a chapter. Not guaranteed to be set.

id.description: This is used only on the UI. It is just index of being added.

RecentlyAddedItemDto.description: A mesh of data for Recently added volume/chapters

RefreshSeriesDto.description: Used for running some task against a Series.

email.description: An email to register with. Optional. Provides Forgot Password functionality

oldPassword.description: The old, existing password. If an admin is performing the change, this is not required. Otherwise, it is.

apiKey.description: Api key for a user with Admin permissions

ScanFolderDto.description: DTO for requesting a folder to be scanned

SearchResultGroupDto.description: Represents all Search results for a query

name.description: The UI visible Name of the Series. This may or may not be the same as the OriginalName

normalizedLocalizedName.description: Used internally for localized name matching. M:API.Services.Tasks.Scanner.Parser.Parser.Normalize(System.String)

sortName.description: The name used to sort the Series. By default, will be the same as Name.

localizedName.description: Name in original language (Japanese for Manga). By default, will be same as Name.

originalName.description: Original Name on disk. Not exposed to UI.

lastModified.description: Whenever a modification occurs. Ie) New volumes, removed volumes, title update, etc

coverImage.description: Absolute path to the (managed) image file

coverImageLocked.description: Denotes if the CoverImage has been overridden by the user. If so, it will not be updated during normal scan operations.

pages.description: Sum of all Volume page counts

folderPath.description: Highest path (that is under library root) that contains the series.

lastFolderScanned.description: Last time the folder was scanned

lastChapterAdded.description: When a Chapter was last added onto the Series

wordCount.description: Total Word count of all chapters in this chapter.

relations.description: Relations to other Series, like Sequels, Prequels, etc

specials.description: Specials for the Series. These will have their title and range cleaned to remove the special marker and prepare

chapters.description: All Chapters, excluding Specials and single chapters (0 chapter) for a volume

volumes.description: Just the Volumes for the Series (Excludes Volume 0)

storylineChapters.description: These are chapters that are in Volume 0 and should be read AFTER the volumes

SeriesDetailDto.description:
This is a special DTO for a UI page in Kavita. This performs sorting and grouping and returns exactly what UI requires for layout.
This is subject to change, do not rely on this Data model.

pagesRead.description: Sum of pages read from linked Volumes. Calculated at API-time.

latestReadDate.description: DateTime representing last time the series was Read. Calculated at API-time.

lastChapterAdded.description: DateTime representing last time a chapter was added to the Series

userRating.description: Rating from logged in user. Calculated at API-time.

userReview.description: Review from logged in user. Calculated at API-time.

wordCount.description: Total number of words for the series. Only applies to epubs.

folderPath.description: The highest level folder for this Series

lastFolderScanned.description: The last time the folder for this series was scanned

people.description: All people attached at a Series level.

totalCount.description: Total number of issues/volumes in the series

maxCount.description: Max number of issues/volumes in the series (Max of Volume/Issue field in ComicInfo)

ageRatingLocked.description: Locked by user so metadata updates from scan loop will not override AgeRating

publicationStatusLocked.description: Locked by user so metadata updates from scan loop will not override PublicationStatus

tags.description: Collection of all Tags from underlying chapters for a Series

maxCount.description: Max number of issues/volumes in the series (Max of Volume/Issue field in ComicInfo)

totalCount.description: Total number of issues/volumes for the series

ageRatingLocked.description: Locked by user so metadata updates from scan loop will not override AgeRating

publicationStatusLocked.description: Locked by user so metadata updates from scan loop will not override PublicationStatus

targetSeriesId.description: A is Sequel to B. In this example, TargetSeries is A. B will hold the foreign key.

SeriesRelation.description:
A relation flows between one series and another.
Series ---kind---> target

installId.description: Unique Id that represents a unique install

isDocker.description: If the Kavita install is using Docker

numOfCores.description: Number of Cores on the instance

numberOfLibraries.description: The number of libraries on the instance

activeSiteTheme.description: The site theme the install is using

numberOfUsers.description: Number of users on the install

numberOfCollections.description: Number of collections on the install

numberOfReadingLists.description: Number of reading lists on the install (Sum of all users)

totalFiles.description: Total number of files in the instance

totalGenres.description: Total number of Genres in the instance

totalPeople.description: Total number of People in the instance

storeBookmarksAsWebP.description: Is this instance storing bookmarks as WebP

usersOnCardLayout.description: Number of users on this instance using Card Layout

usersOnListLayout.description: Number of users on this instance using List Layout

maxSeriesInALibrary.description: Max number of Series for any library on the instance

maxVolumesInASeries.description: Max number of Volumes for any library on the instance

maxChaptersInASeries.description: Max number of Chapters for any library on the instance

usingSeriesRelationships.description: Does this instance have relationships setup between series

mangaReaderBackgroundColors.description: A list of background colors set on the instance

mangaReaderPageSplittingModes.description: A list of Page Split defaults being used on the instance

mangaReaderLayoutModes.description: A list of Layout Mode defaults being used on the instance

fileFormats.description: A list of file formats existing in the instance

usingRestrictedProfiles.description: If there is at least one user that is using an age restricted profile on the instance

usersWithEmulateComicBook.description: Number of users using the Emulate Comic Book setting

percentOfLibrariesWithFolderWatchingEnab.description: Percent (0.0-1.0) of libraries with folder watching enabled

percentOfLibrariesIncludedInSearch.description: Percent (0.0-1.0) of libraries included in Search

percentOfLibrariesIncludedInRecommended.description: Percent (0.0-1.0) of libraries included in Recommended

percentOfLibrariesIncludedInDashboard.description: Percent (0.0-1.0) of libraries included in Dashboard

totalReadingHours.description: Total reading hours of all users

storeCoversAsWebP.description: Is the Server saving covers as WebP

ServerInfoDto.description: Represents information about a Kavita Installation

loggingLevel.description: Logging level for server. Managed in appsettings.json.

port.description: Port the server listens on. Managed in appsettings.json.

allowStatCollection.description: Allows anonymous information to be collected and sent to KavitaStats

enableOpds.description: Enables OPDS connections to be made to the server.

baseUrl.description: Base Url for the kavita. Requires restart to take effect.

emailServiceUrl.description: Email service to use for the invite user flow, forgot password, etc.

installId.description: Represents a unique Id to this Kavita installation. Only used in Stats to identify unique installs.

convertBookmarkToWebP.description: If the server should save bookmarks as WebP encoding

totalBackups.description: The amount of Backups before cleanup

enableFolderWatching.description: If Kavita should watch the library folders and process changes

totalLogs.description: Total number of days worth of logs to keep at a given time.

convertCoverToWebP.description: If the server should save covers as WebP encoding

mostPopularSeries.description: Total users who have started/reading/read per series

fileName.description:
File path to the content. Stored under API.Services.DirectoryService.SiteThemeDirectory.
Must be a .css file

isDefault.description: Only one theme can have this. Will auto-set this as default for new user accounts

SiteTheme.description: Represents a set of css overrides the user can upload to Kavita and will load into webui

fileName.description:
File path to the content. Stored under API.Services.DirectoryService.SiteThemeDirectory.
Must be a .css file

isDefault.description: Only one theme can have this. Will auto-set this as default for new user accounts

SiteThemeDto.description: Represents a set of css overrides the user can upload to Kavita and will load into webui

comicsTime.description: Amount of time read on Comic libraries

isDocker.description: If this install is within Docker

UpdateNotificationDto.description: Update Notification denoting a new release available for user to update to

UpdateReadingListPosition.description: DTO for moving a reading list item to another position within the same list

libraries.description: A list of libraries to grant access to

seriesIds.description: List of Series Ids that will be Added/Removed

UpdateWantToReadDto.description: A list of Series to pass when working with Want To Read APIs

url.description: Base Url encoding of the file to upload from (can be null)

emulateBook.description: Manga Reader Option: Emulate a book by applying a shadow effect on the pages

backgroundColor.description: Manga Reader Option: Background color of the reader

autoCloseMenu.description: Manga Reader Option: Allow the menu to close after 6 seconds without interaction

showScreenHints.description: Manga Reader Option: Show screen hints to the user on some actions, ie) pagination direction change

bookReaderMargin.description: Book Reader Option: Override extra Margin

bookReaderFontSize.description: Book Reader Option: Override font size

bookReaderFontFamily.description: Book Reader Option: Maps to the default Kavita font-family (inherit) or an override

bookReaderTapToPaginate.description: Book Reader Option: Allows tapping on side of screens to paginate

bookReaderImmersiveMode.description: Book Reader Option: A flag that hides the menu-ing system behind a click on the screen. This should be used with tap to paginate, but the app doesn't enforce this.

blurUnreadSummaries.description: UI Site Global Setting: If unread summaries should be blurred until expanded or unless user has read it already

promptForDownloadSize.description: UI Site Global Setting: Should Kavita prompt user to confirm downloads that are greater than 100 MB.

noTransitions.description: UI Site Global Setting: Should Kavita disable CSS transitions

timeSpentReading.description: Total time spent reading based on estimates

name.description: A String representation of the volume number. Allows for floats.

number.description: The minimum number in the Name field in Int form

coverImage.description: Absolute path to the (managed) image file

pages.description: Total pages of all chapters in this volume

wordCount.description: Total Word count of all chapters in this volume.

Bearer.description: Please insert JWT with Bearer into field
Bearer.name: Authorization

tags.name: Download
tags.description: All APIs related to downloading entities from the system. Requires Download Role or Admin Role.

tags.name: Image
tags.description: Responsible for servicing up images stored in Kavita for entities

tags.name: Reader
tags.description: For all things regarding reading, mainly focusing on non-Book related entities

tags.name: Search
tags.description: Responsible for the Search interface from the UI

tags.name: Tachiyomi
tags.description:
All APIs are for Tachiyomi extension and app. They have hacks for our implementation and should not be used for any
other purposes.

tags.name: WantToRead
tags.description: Responsible for all things Want To Read
